meanings.definition: To bring back to mind; remember.
meanings.sent1: I have trouble recalling names sometimes.
meanings.sent2: She is recalling her favorite childhood memories.
meanings.sent3: While recalling the grocery list, she accidentally bought two bags of chips.
meanings.sent4: The old photograph instantly started recalling happy times.
meanings.sent5: Recalling the lyrics of the song, she sang along joyfully.

meanings.sent1: He is recalling the safety procedures in case of an emergency.
meanings.sent2: The teacher is recalling the students' attention to the lesson.
meanings.sent3: Recalling the importance of the meeting, she rushed back to the office.
meanings.sent4: The alarm clock was recalling him to the reality of the early morning.
meanings.sent5: Recalling the fire drill instructions, she guided everyone to the exit.

meanings.definition: To call back; summon to return.
meanings.sent1: The coach is recalling the players to the field for practice.
meanings.sent2: The company is recalling the defective products for a refund.
meanings.sent3: Recalling the dog from chasing the squirrel, she avoided a chaotic scene.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the bell was recalling the students from the playground.
meanings.sent5: Recalling the troops from the battlefield was a strategic decision.
